caption.p: Lateral flow assays for detecting 2019-nCoV antigens or antibodies to 2019-nCoV. (a) Diagram showing LFA-based quick detection of 2019-nCoV in an IgM-IgG combined antibody assay. (b) A diagram showing different test results. (c) Representative assay test showing results from blood of different patients. Patient #13: IgM and IgG positive; #14: IgM weak positive; #15: IgM and IgG negative; #16: IgG weakly positive; #17: IgG positive only; #18: IgM positive only.
